alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 17 at 5:48PM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Southeast Greene, Blount Smoky Mountains and Sevier Smoky Mountains Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
